author: Jacob Ranson
title: Sir Alex Ferguson was 'the godfather of Man United who was on top of everything', says Wayne Rooney
description: The Red Devils went from a Premier League powerhouse right up until Ferguson's retirement at the end of the 2012/13 season to a team struggling to reach the top four ever since.
content:
Manchester United legend Wayne Rooney insisted the club has struggled ever since 'a void was left' by the departure of boss Sir Alex Ferguson
